title: ComponentInstance
description: Instance of a LibraryComponent with application-specific configuration

order.description: Render order of this component instance within its parent View or SubView's component list. Lower values render first.

ref.description: SpecNodeId of the ux.librarycomponent this instance is based on (e.g., 'ux.librarycomponent.data-table'). Determines the component type and the set of valid prop keys.

props.description: Key-value map of property overrides applied to this instance. Keys must match prop names declared on the referenced LibraryComponent. Values override the component defaults for this specific usage.
